Noise Map Generator

Noise generation is a technique that is often used in game development to generate game worlds. I created this project as a way to see if I could implement noise inside of Quest so that I could use it for later projects.

I actually wanted to add a few more features before publishing it but I didn't want to spend too much time on the project. I may end up adding them later on though.

Here's the noise library I used and here's the article I referenced to create this.
